text: Tell me what's going on. Well, the kids are taking cookies out of the cookie jar. The other one's there holding her hand. The jar is going to fall. She's washing dishes and forgot to turn the sink off. Water's going all over the floor. The dishes are on the sink. It looks like a face laying in a yard. The way the grass is. . Tell me everything you see going on in the picture. Just tell me when you're finished. Hmm. That's what we got. Kid taking cookies out of the cookie
